short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension helps automate the booking process for booking received through various modes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify and automate the booking process for reservations received via multiple channels.

This extension provides a seamless gateway for integrating booking processes and optimising operational efficiency by incorporating our state-of-the-art third-party solution into your company's website.

Please reach out to Indecab Support team to subscribe and start using this extension.
